response.original_title: Starfest: The Stars Salute Public Television 1983
response.overview: Filmed in 1983 at Las Vegas's Tropicana Hotel and hosted by Diahann Carroll and Richard Kiley, this variety special features a star-studded cast. Performers include Kiley, who sings his show-stopping rendition of "The Impossible Dream," and Tony Award winner Patti LuPone, who belts out "Don't Cry for Me, Argentina." Steve Allen, Jayne Meadows, Roberta Peters, impressionist Rich Little and mime duo Shields & Yarnell also make appearances.
response.tagline: A very Vegas show to raise money for Public Television
response.title: Starfest: The Stars Salute Public Television 1983
